To weigh in on the murder of the French parish priest in Rouen, Normandy, by Muslim militants associated with the Islamic State, we’ll hear from Kirsten Evans of the nonprofit organization In Defense of Christians, which is dedicated to the preservation and protection of Christianity in the Middle East; Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy; and Sam Patten of the Committee to Destroy ISIS.

On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Executive Chairman Stephen K. Bannon will continue our coverage of the chaotic disunity at the Democratic National Convention in Philadelphia, as supporters of Vermont Senator Bernie Sanders balk at accepting the corrupt and compromised candidacy of Hillary Clinton.

Live from Philly, Breitbart’s Patrick Howley, Lee Stranahan, and Joel Pollak (author of the new book new book See No Evil: 19 Hard Truths the Left Can’t Handle) will report on the scene inside and outside the convention center.

Breitbart correspondent Julia Hahn will report live from Speaker Paul Ryan’s district in Janesville, Wisconsin, where the open borders Ryan is locked in a primary fight against challenger Paul Nehlen.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
We’ll also hear from veteran pollster Pat Caddell and Jared Rizzi, the White House correspondent for POTUS on Sirius XM’s Channel 124, live from Philly.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
